title: Serif ID appreaciated
content:
Any help identifying this face is much appreciated. Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706111438im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/goya_5401.jpg)

author: Silvermule

comments.content: For future reference it is ITC Didi. It is good to reference other threads, but useful as well to reference the name.
